name: Red Soul Crystal - Stage 18
description: Red Crystal that absorbs souls, stage 18. Special abilities can be applied to the weapon when absorbing certain amount of souls. MP 26 is consumed each time of use. This level crystal is said to absorb crystals on its own, so it doesn't seem like you need to use it directly on the monsters

name: Blue Soul Crystal - Stage 18
description: Blue Crystal that absorbs souls, stage 18. Special abilities can be applied to the weapon when absorbing certain amount of souls. MP 26 is consumed each time of use.
